name: tauri-plugin-authium-api
author: grcq
description: Plugin for Tauri as a wrapper for Authium.

scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha:minor: pnpm version preminor --preid=alpha && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:beta:minor: pnpm version preminor --preid=beta && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:rc:minor: pnpm version preminor --preid=rc && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha:major: pnpm version premajor --preid=alpha && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:beta:major: pnpm version premajor --preid=beta && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:rc:major: pnpm version premajor --preid=rc && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha:patch: pnpm version prepatch --preid=alpha && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:beta:patch: pnpm version prepatch --preid=beta && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:rc:patch: pnpm version prepatch --preid=rc && pnpm build && powershell -Command "cargo set-version $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && cargo publish --dry-run && cargo publish && pnpm publish --access public
